meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or containing acetylene.
meanings.sent1: The acetylenic torch was used for welding.
meanings.sent2: The lab tested the acetylenic gas for purity.
meanings.sent3: The acetylenic balloon floated high in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her acetylenic smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The acetylenic sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to compounds containing a triple bond between two carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: The acetylenic compound was highly reactive.
meanings.sent2: Chemists studied the properties of acetylenic molecules.
meanings.sent3: The acetylenic reaction fizzled out unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: His acetylenic ideas sparked innovation in the field.
meanings.sent5: The acetylenic bond between them was unbreakable.
